title: Pumpkin pie with brandy
ingredients: ['300ml (1/2 pt) pumpkin, cooked and sieved', '1/4 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/4 teaspoon nutmeg', '1 pinch cinnamon', '3 eggs, beaten', '2 tablespoons brandy', '150ml (1/4 pt) milk, or as needed', '110g (4 oz) caster sugar (or to taste)', 'ready made shortcrust pastry for a 23cm (9 in) pie']
